body: Aah my precious childhood memories
WHY THE ITS LIKE NOT EVEN SHIZUKA BUT I LIKE IT :)
@CVNT The artist has just opened a Patreon page too: patreon.com/tsunekira
I've tried searching for the Japanese title but nothing has popped up under its name. might not be a Japanese doujin from the start but falsely labeled as one.

Think about the Artists is not just going to stop drawing the doujin in the middle of the work or leave it a work in Progress either for 8+ months if he or she's lost their motivation.  I'm sure it was finished long ago and the artists moved on to other projects. It's the Uploaders fault for not posting it completely after the translations, type sitting, re-drawing and cleaning are done just like how raw manga works before its turned into English. Has anyone detriment whats the original language of the doujins is BEFORE it's posted. Maybe someone could look for the Raw version to see if it got done.

PS @ CVNT it's not the Artists you need to support to get more pages on here it's the fucking douchebag Uploader's / Fan Scanlation person who translates the Raw and thinks it's FUNNY to make us wait many months in between pages before their lazy asses decides to do more scanning.
This fucking doujin needs to be completed soon. Who fucking only adds a few pages bi-monthly anyways. you are Not keeping the readers interested you're just pissing us off jerk by not finishing it.
It's not NTR if we got it from the point of view of the guy who fucks. This is an alpha male fantasy, a textbook Chad move.
this needs to hurry up and finish uploading the rest of the fucking pages. Don't take 6+ months to do this Crap.
Lmao fuck nobita in this manga
DORAEMON can do better
The guy has a pixiv and Twitter account, support the guy if you want to have another page. I don't really like ntr but this artstyle is so cool and nobitas a cunt here.
Nice artstyle, I would like to see another doujin from this artist.

Интересно это финал или продолжение будет?

Her actual boyfriend is such a self absorbed prick, the only reason she hasn't dumped his ass again is because plot can't have much NTR going on if she's not attached to someone. As a twisted person who enjoys a good NTR story I find this to be a bit of cheat but perhaps its the middle ground needed to bring people like me and vanilla purists together without bloodshed idk.
Tbh, not a NTR lover, but the guy deserves it.
I cant really find this as ntr or cheating as they were nvm in a good or proper relationship it looked more like a title or status to have
